thread.title: Here is why Perrie Edwards is wearing ex Zyan Malik's ring in new video
thread.title_full: Here is why Perrie Edwards is wearing ex Zyan Malik's ring in new video - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Here is why Perrie Edwards is wearing ex Zyan Malik's ring in new video
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct. 3(ANI): Don't mistake Perrie Edwards as a desperate chick who's still longing for the guy who dumped her, after watching her latest video.*
Washington D.C., Oct. 3(ANI): Don't mistake Perrie Edwards as a desperate chick who's still longing for the guy who dumped her, after watching her latest video. The 22-year-old songstress, who recently released the video of her single 'Love Me Like You' was seen wearing her engagement ring in the clip that raised a lot of eyebrows, reports TMZ.com. When fans speculated the singer on why she is wearing the ring even after her break up with Zyan Malik, it was made clear that the video was shot when the duo was still dating. Sources, who were on present on the sets, revealed that the 'Wings; hit-maker kept the ring on during shooting because she was very much in love at that time. (ANI) Â»
